name: @labor-digital/typo3-vue-framework
description: This package contains a wrapper around the vue.js framework that is designed to provide a complete frontend for your TYPO3 website

scripts.doc: typedoc --out doc --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json src && echo typo3-vue-framework.labor.tools >> doc/CNAME && touch doc/.nojekyll

author: m.neundorfer@labor.digital
